title: Please Remove Illaoi
body: {{champion:420}} is so broken and takes 0 skill to use. Shes so easy to play you dont even have to hit the enemy.....The tentacles do that for you     -_-. And dont tell me "ohhh well shes new and people just have to get used to her".....ive seen multiple Challenger Koren games and she fks everyone up in every single one

>
> {{champion:420}} is so broken and takes 0 skill to use.


that's why I saw a level 3 go 0-9 as illaoi against a Ziggs bot. (I'm not name and shaming)
